## 1.0.4 (2020-03-25)

* switch build system to dune
* use mirage-crypto instead of nocrypto

## 1.0.3 (2018-03-15)

* safe-string compatibility (without further allocations)
* time passing fixed

## 1.0.2 (2017-03-03)

* replace oasis with topkg
* adapt to current nocrypto

## 1.0.1 (2016-02-23)

* replace stringext with astring

## 1.0.0 (2015-07-28)

* Initial release
